name: Piggy Kingdom
description:
Jingle-jingle, get your Piggy Kingdom ready - time to solve puzzles and get rewards. Match 3 games will leave happy emotions afterward. Piggy Kingdom will take you on an exciting journey where you will:
• Solve puzzles
• Match, swap and crush colors
• Get tons of unique boosters
• Rich rewards - earn coins and exchange them for in-game goods
• Hundreds of challenging, chilling, and funny levels
• Beautiful animations, cheerful music
• Lots of ways to kill time with fun and joy
• Easy to play and win! Here is where we all feel fine!


IT IS NOT A WASTE OF TIME. Challenging yet enjoyable match 3 puzzle games where you need to train your brain by swiping colorful objects in shapes of three or more. It just sounds to be so easy. Ha-ha-ha.


SMILE AS YOU WATCH YOUR BOOSTERS DOING MAGIC. Every time you wisely move sweet colorful pieces together – the puzzle game will give you unique powerful boosters.


EVERY ATTEMPT IS APPRECIATED. Get rewards. Use accumulated boosters to finish a hard puzzle-solving game or keep them for the updated levels ahead.


EYE CANDY GRAPHICS + VISUALS. Your Piggy Kingdom game has never been so real. Hahaha. Boosters, puzzles, characters, surroundings, everything in this game looks so delightful.

When you see the board which you need to clear – things look so real. Some of them you even may find at home around you in real life. The best puzzle solving & color swiping match 3 game is here for you! Piggy Kingdom is waiting for you!


PIGGY KING AND THE CASTLE. The character's reactions are so funny to look at, and the castle has so many details to give a closer look at.


FROM BEGINNERS TO PROS! Your level of playing and solving match three puzzle games can be different, but be sure, you will enjoy this match 3 game.


This application offers a free-to-play experience with the option for in-game purchases.
